mapper.select: select * from ProdQAs where product_id = #{product_id} and prodQA_refOrder = #{prodQA_refOrder} and prodQA_isDelete = 'N' order by ProdQA_ref desc, prodQA_refOrder asc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from ProdQAs where product_id = #{product_id} and prodQA_refOrder = #{prodQA_refOrder} and prodQA_isDelete = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into ProdQAs(product_id, member_id, prodQA_title, prodQA_content, prodQA_ref, prodQA_img1, prodQA_isSecret, prodQA_secretPassword, prodQA_category, prodQA_img2, prodQA_img3) values(#{product_id}, #{member_id}, #{prodQA_title}, #{prodQA_content}, #{prodQA_ref}, #{prodQA_img1}, #{prodQA_isSecret}, md5(sha1(#{prodQA_secretPassword})), #{prodQA_category}, #{prodQA_img2}, #{prodQA_img3})
mapper.select: select * from ProdQAs where product_id = #{product_id} and prodQA_no = #{prodQA_no}
select count(member_id) from ProdQAs where prodQA_secretPassword = md5(sha1(#{prodQA_secretPassword})) and prodQA_no = #{prodQA_no}
mapper.update: update ProdQAs set prodQA_isDelete = 'Y' where prodQA_no = #{prodQA_no}
update ProdQAs set prodQA_viewCnt = prodQA_viewCnt + 1 where prodQA_no = #{prodQA_no}
update ProdQAs set prodQA_likeCnt = (select count(*) from ProdQAsLike where prodQA_no = #{prodQA_no}) where prodQA_no = #{prodQA_no}
mapper.delete: delete from ProdQAsLike where member_id = #{member_id} and prodQA_no = #{prodQA_no}
